Producer: Michel Franco, Eréndira Núñez Larios, Cristina Velasco
Production Co: Teorema Films, Common Ground Pictures, Luxbox, Film i Väst, Doco Digital
Synopsis: Neil and Alice Bennett (Tim Roth, Charlotte Gainsbourg) are the core of a wealthy family on vacation in Mexico with younger members Colin and Alexa (Samuel Bottomley, Albertine Kotting McMillan) until a distant emergency cuts their trip short. When one relative disrupts the family's tight-knit order, simmering tensions rise to the fore in this suspenseful jolt from writer/director Michel Franco.
Title: Sundown
